welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mino, Japan! Get ready to explore the charming city known for its beautiful natural scenery, traditional paper-making, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and make the most of all that Mino has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection after a certain period of time.
